snippet: The man thought to be behind the kidnapping of foreign hostages in Algeria is a well-known kingpin of the jihadist movement in Saharan Africa. He recently split from Al Qaeda and is now running his own operations from Islamist-controlled northern...
abstract: The man thought to be behind the kidnapping of foreign hostages in Algeria is a well-known kingpin of the jihadist movement in Saharan Africa. He recently split from Al Qaeda and is now running his own operations from Islamist-controlled northern Mali.

headline.main: Jihadist Kingpin Suspected in Hostage Seizure

keywords.value: Mujao (Movement for Oneness and Jihad in West Africa)
